original_text: “It is just as I said to Pharaoh: God has shown Pharaoh what he is about to do.
korean_text: 내가 바로에게 이르기를 하나님이 그가 하실 일을 바로에게 보이신다 함이 이것이라

sentences.original_text: It is just as I said to Pharaoh:
sentences.korean_translation: 이것은 내가 바로에게 한 말과 같습니다:

sentences.original_text: what he is about to do.
